title: Relationship Dos and Don'ts
description:
Jillian and the crew discuss the importance of being honest about what you want when you’re dating; the most effective form of male birth control; and email questions about workouts, internet trolls, and more!


Start your FREE 7 day trial for Jillian’s My Fitness App at https://go.jillianmichaels.com/WNt1rL7uyZ


This week’s sponsor codes:

THIRDLOVE.com/jillian for 15% off your first purchase

LEGACYBOX.com/JILLIAN to get 40% off your first order

HELLOFRESH.com/jillian80, promo code jillian80 for $80 off your first month

LIGHTSTREAM.com/Jillian for an additional interest rate discount
